detail_desc: Shorts in soft, slub jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Ankle-length circular skirt in softly draping jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a high slit.
Hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a pocket in woven fabric and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a gathered, elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs.
Ankle-length trousers in superstretch jersey with a slight sheen. Low, elasticated waist with a decorative button, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Jumper in a soft fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck, long sleeves and ties at the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour stripes down legs.
Short, wide T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with dropped shoulders.
Cropped top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Hood with a wrapover front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Trousers in soft, thermal fleece with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front and narrow, adjustable, frill-trimmed shoulder straps that cross at the back. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset lace detail and a flared skirt. Lined.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and short shorts. Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Shorts in crushed velvet with an elasticated waist.
Padded jacket in nylon with an appliqué at the top. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.

Straight-cut blouse in softly draping satin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short wrap skirt in a linen and viscose weave with a flounced trim at the front and hem. High waist with a concealed button at one side and ties at the other. Unlined.
Top in soft jersey with lace cap sleeves and gathers at the sides for a good fit over the tummy.
Ankle-length kaftan in an airy, softly draping viscose weave with a shimmer. V-neck, a vertical seam down the front and back, and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Jacket in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide, straight-cut, calf-length dress in soft, gently draping satin with a sheen. V-neck and a yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long, gathered, voluminous balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and close-fitting cuffs with a covered button. Short slits in the sides.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats at the front. Double yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves with grosgrain trims down the sides. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of joggers in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high, elasticated waist with a sewn-on tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed fastening and patch side pockets.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a contrasting colour collar in woven fabric, button placket, fake pocket at the top and press-studs at the crotch.
Cardigan in soft, pointelle-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with frill details, a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with narrow frill trims.
Sleeveless playsuit in airy, patterned viscose with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam and twisted ties with tassels at the waist.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a decoration on the front, grosgrain trim around the opening and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the waist.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and short, narrow shoulder straps. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with slits at the hem. Lined.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Fingerless gloves in a soft cable knit.
Short jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with long sleeves and a V-neck with lacing at the front.
Metal rings in various designs.
Metal rings in various designs. Half of the rings are decorated with sparkly stones.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cropped vest top in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

All-in-one suit in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard at the top. Zipped front pockets, elastication at the back of the waist and elasticated cuffs and hems. Reinforced back and legs, and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a yoke. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a drawstring with tassels at the waist, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Mesh bikini briefs with decorative trims, a mid waist and lined gusset. Narrow sides, high-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a deep neckline at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Dungarees in soft, washed cotton denim with a heart-shaped pocket at the top and flounce-trimmed straps with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the front. Press-stud at the sides, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Hoodie in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a high collar, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Trousers in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, jetted side pockets and an inner pocket. Sturdy ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Sunglasses with patterned plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Long, sleeveless dress in tulle with embroidery, a small frill trim around the neckline and armholes, and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, a gathered seam at the waist and gathered seams on the skirt with grosgrain trims finishing with a wide flounce at the hem. Sewn-in underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave containing glittery threads with a slit at the neck and double-layered gathered yoke with tassels at the front. Buttons at the top of the back and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and legs with stripes down the sides and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is partly recycled.
Cotton twill shoes with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with gently dropped shoulders. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted skirt in sturdy cotton twill with a high, pleated paper bag waist and wide, detachable fabric belt with a plastic buckle. Buttons down the front and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a sweetheart neckline, short puff sleeves with gathered elastication, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
